name: california roll
mainIngredients: Rice, cucumber, crab meat or imitation crab, and avocado

name: rainbow roll
mainIngredients: Raw tuna, raw salmon, and imitation crab, with cucumber and avocado as the vegetables

name: dragon roll
mainIngredients: Shrimp tempura, avocado, cucumber, rice, nori, lemon

name: temaki
mainIngredients: Rolled cone of seaweed, wrapped around rice and fillings

name: uramaki
mainIngredients: Short grain rice that is a little sticky, nori (seaweed sheets), rice vinegar, toasted sesame seeds, fish, meat, and vegetables

name: hosomaki
mainIngredients: Roll is filled with natto (fermented soybean), raw seafood and scallions

name: maki
mainIngredients: Seaweed and vinegared rice filled with different ingredients such as fish and vegetables

name: gukan maki
mainIngredients: a ball of rice, wrapped in seaweed and smoked salmon, and topped with fish roe.
